item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us at the Seacoast Science Center as  we listen to the Jumbo Circus Peanuts band play, this event only happens once a year. On the ocean. Rated New England's #1 Summer Music Festival. Great food, plus draft beer and fine wine onsite. Under the big top. You'd be wicked smaht to take it in. Rain or shine, a great family party. Plus, a free Meet and Greet with our own legendary Spidy after the show. Learn about weird chords, Spidy's triple-neck guitar collection and what a rock star does when he's offstage. May not be suitable for normal people due to strong graphics and intense dramatization. Sponsored by Seacoast Science Center and local businesses.

Bring a lawn chair or a blanket, there will be lot's of people there we will be seating near the fence next to the beach side.

See you all there!

Peter

Music-by-the-Sea Concert Series

Kick back with your friends and family on Thursday evenings in July and hear some of the hottest bands in New England during our Music-by-the-Sea Concert Series. Just bring your beach blanket or chair and leave the cooking to us. You can bring a picnic or enjoy hot off-the-grill fare, snacks and ice cream treats. Adults, you can enjoy an ice cold beer or a glass of wine*. Come relax to a scenic sunset by the shore or dance the night away! All proceeds from the concert series support our environmental education efforts.

Ages 13-Adult: $8 for non-members, $4 for SSC members
Children ages 3-12: $2 for non-members, $1 for SSC members
Under age 3: Free

Gates open at 5:00 p.m. for dining; music begins at 6:00 p.m.

*You may not bring alcohol in to the park or concerts.

2012 Concert Schedule July 5 · Islandside July 19 · Soulmate July 12 · Entrain July 26 · Jumbo Circus Peanuts

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Music by the Sea
